attributes.action: Giver a percentage of the lottery money to the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
lets try and get our NHS back if possible to how it was, and for what it was meant for.
Scale down the managers, and with money funded from OUR LOTTERY, pay the wages of the graduated Doctors/Nurses/Midwives/Medical Staff whom have trained but cannot find work, this in its self would bring down the waiting lists. and more importantly employ Matrons with the extra funding, lets stop wasting the money we will all need the NHS sometime in our lives, lets stand up and be counted AND SAY WE ARE ALL SICK OF OUR LOTTERY MONEY FUNDING THINGS THAT ARE NOT AS IMPORTANT AS OUR HEALTH.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
